Class ShareCallback

java.lang.Object
  com.sharethis.loopy.sdk.ApiCallback
      com.sharethis.loopy.sdk.ShareCallback

public abstract class ShareCallback
extends ApiCallback

Callback used when creating a tracking url.

Jason Polites

onResult

public abstract void onResult(Item item,
                              Throwable error)
Called when the asynchronous call to the API has returned.

Parameters:
item - The original item being shared. If there is no error, a shortlink will be available.
error - The error object if there was a failure. This is null for successful results.

                             String title,
                             Intent shareIntent)
Convenience method for showing the share dialog from within the callback.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
title - The title to show on the dialog.
shareIntent - The original share intent.

showDialog

public final void showDialog(Context context,
                             String title,
                             Intent shareIntent,
                             ShareDialogListener listener)
Convenience method for showing the share dialog from within the callback.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
title - The title to show on the dialog.
shareIntent - The original share intent.
listener - A listener to handle/intercept dialog events.

reportShare

public final void reportShare(Context context,
                              Intent intent)
Convenience method for reporting a share when using a ShareActionProvider.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
intent - The intent that was used for the share.
